name: Portuguese Toast
author: ZIGMOND0
summary: The perfect way to serve yesterdays fresh rolls. Buttered and toasted, Portuguese pops get a second chance in this pleasing snack.
ingredients: 2 (6 inch) French sandwich rolls, or Portuguese pops
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium heat
Split the rolls in half lengthwise, and spread butter on the insides of the bread, reserving any leftover butter
Place the rolls butter side down in the pan, and place a saucer or plate on top of the rolls to act as a press
Apply just a little pressure so the bread is not flattened
Pay attention, they can cook very fast
Spread any remaining butter onto the rolls as soon as they are done
